body: I am kinda worried, since I've been making mane replies and discussions. Pls don't get mad.
body_tagged: I am kinda worried, since I've been making mane replies and discussions. Pls don't get mad.
title: is too much web activity punishable?

replies.body: No, as long as you don't spam the forums you're good :)
replies.body_tagged: No, as long as you don't spam the forums you're good :)

replies.body: As long as your not SPAMMING SPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMING it should be ok.
replies.body_tagged: As long as your not SPAMMING SPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMINGSPAMMING it should be ok.

replies.body: Don't worry, as long as your replies aren't spam you won't be punished :P
replies.body_tagged: Don't worry, as long as your replies aren't spam you won't be punished :P

replies.body: Creating useless posts that don't contribute to what's it's needed for.
replies.body_tagged: Creating useless posts that don't contribute to what's it's needed for.

replies.body: Only if you what you are posting is spam. (Pointless posts or discussions often off topic and irrelevant). If you are making valid contributions or conversation with your posts and topics you should be ok. Just try not to multi-post and stick to the topic at hand.
replies.body_tagged: Only if you what you are posting is spam. (Pointless posts or discussions often off topic and irrelevant). If you are making valid contributions or conversation with your posts and topics you should be ok. Just try not to multi-post and stick to the topic at hand.

replies.body:
For example:

XxGlitchyxX: I shreked this kid in a 1v1,

noob123: I like bananas.

That is spam.
replies.body_tagged:
For example:

XxGlitchyxX: I shreked this kid in a 1v1,

noob123: I like bananas.

That is spam.

replies.body: Just focus on contributing to the topic and being nice and helpful :D
replies.body_tagged: Just focus on contributing to the topic and being nice and helpful :D

replies.body: If you are making many posts on the forums, it is acceptable, as long as they are on topic and appropriate.
replies.body_tagged: If you are making many posts on the forums, it is acceptable, as long as they are on topic and appropriate.
